extendedInfo.description: Pro Clock Widget is a useful, hassle free, clock widget which besides showing the local time on a classic analog view, gives you the date, the local temperature, plus the current day on lunar calendar, and the present zodiac position of the moon. And whatâs more it will give a nice view to the screen of your device!Features and functions:1-	The Clock: shows the local time on a two-hand analog clock; DST can be set.2-	Calendars:	A-	The Digital Calendar (see fig.): in a frame locate lower part of the clock disc, you can choose for it to show either day of the week, or the date according to Gregorian, solar Hijri, or lunar  Hirjri calendars.	B-	The Ring Calendar: one the outer ring of the clock disc (see fig.), a hand shows which day of the month we are (based on Gregorian or Persian calendars).3-	The Moon Window (see fig.): shows which day of current lunar month we are, and shows the     present moon phase.4-	Zodiac Moon Indicator (see fig.):  gives you the present zodiac position of the moon.5-	Present Local Temperature (see fig.): to show this feature your device must be connected to the internet, otherwise it will not show.6-	Times of fajr (dawn), noon, and maghrib (twilight): of these times the one which is the first forthcoming at the moment will be shown in lower half of the clock disc (see fig.).

reviews.title: Great Analog Clock
reviews.comment: A wonderful analog clock with a very unique moon phase display. The moon phase display is the best I\'ve ever seen for an analog type clock. Also has many options to view date, weather, etc. 5 stars all the way!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: A few things that should be taken care of (using Note 2).  1. When using the widget the clock stops responding after the device time out and switched on again. I have to tap the clock again for it to display the correct time and continue. 2. When in widget mode please also show the seconds hand.  3. When in full display mode make the background changeable.  Once the above is done will give 5 star.
reviews.author: Dennis Teo

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very nice analog clock, nest I\'ve seen so far.
reviews.author: Jay Gladieux

reviews.title: One essential thing missed
reviews.comment: The most attractive interface and usefully versatile analogue clock available. The clock looks like it was made by IWC, and I want one. HOWEVER. Where is the second hand? It is an essential part of the clock, and it is suddenly rendered a good 30% less useful. Please work it out, I so want to give you 5*****.
reviews.author: Jonathan Bouthemy de Chavieres

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Just what i was looking for :)  two comments though: 1. in the widget, we loose the seconds hand 2. in the widget, we loose the temperature indication
reviews.author: Nabeel Meamary

reviews.title: GREAT BUT
reviews.comment: so far i like it but need some update like way to show 24 hrs and in side the moon u can add number or name of the month and about pointer for milady ring why there is no clear option for the pointer and need to add more option
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmm
reviews.comment: Nice clock app in need of improvement. Second hand only in setting mode and not in main app display. Weather not working at all. Date display wrong.(Y/M/D) instead of (D/M/Y). If fixed then definitely one of the best clock apps on the market and 5 stars. Nexus 4 4.3
reviews.author: Lone Ranger

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Excellent work but need some more to add (Alarm)
reviews.author: Zain Sikkandhar

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: It help me to see moon date n namaz time
reviews.author: M. Faisal

reviews.title: Abo Ahmed
reviews.comment: It\'s good, but  1.  temperature is not shown,  2.  does not show  \'\' religious basics \'\' for prayer\'s time calculations. 3.  Will be better if it had the option of being kept \'\'Live\'\' on screen longer.
reviews.author: Naji Ibrahim

reviews.title: Can\'t turn off features.
reviews.comment: Great looking and full featured, but as I am not of the target religions it would be nice to turn off those specific features.
reviews.author: Matthew Ries

reviews.title: Error message#923
reviews.comment: I got error message#923 when downloading this program.
reviews.author: Omar Al-Amoudi

reviews.title: Best app I have been looking for
reviews.comment: Perfect and one question. Why is it not displaying the second hand. It shows it in the sittings display though?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful clock but...
reviews.comment: ...uses approx. 25% CPU continuously while the display is on. Reluctant uninstall.
reviews.author: John P Coates

reviews.title: Cool apps
reviews.comment: Cool apps but lost second hand.
reviews.author: Muhammad Yusuf
